name: V_EHI_AUDIT_CLP
description: This view contains one row for each audited item changed on a claim print record that corresponds to a column that is configured for EHI export.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user ID of the person who performed edit operations.

columns.name: CHANGE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CHANGE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date/time instance when the claim was edited.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: Stores the old data value that was edited.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: Stores the old data value, in an external format, that was edited.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: Stores the new data value that was added to the claim.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: Stores the new data value, in an external format, that was edited.

columns.name: CHANGED_DATA_ELEMENT
columns.description: The column descriptor that contains the metadata to be associated with data stored in columns OLD_VALUE_INTERNAL and NEW_VALUE_INTERNAL.
